name: Lone & Vita (demo)
description:
By Run & Jump Studio Co. 
Lead Design, Code, Art by [noblelemon] 
Composed by Ansonix

A short but action-packed demo containing the first level of Lone & Vita by Run & Jump Studio Co.! Hack and slash your way as Lone or blast enemies at a distance as Vita and use both their charge attacks to crush enemies! Switch between characters anytime on single-player or have a friend join you in local co-op. Use a variety of different weapons as you push your way through hordes of robots!

Gamepad Support
Lone & Vita has gamepad support.  Gamepad detection should happen immediately.

Keyboard

PLAYER ONE
Move: Arrow Keys
Attack: X
Jump: Z
Dash: C
Use Item: Shift
Change Item: AS
Change Character: Space

PLAYER TWO
Move: Keypad 1235
Attack: N
Jump: B
Dash: M
Use Item: Keypad 0
Change Item: GH
Change Character: Keypad Plus

Controller (on XBOX-styled controller)

Move: Dpad
Attack: X
Jump: A
Dash: B or Right Trigger
Use Item: Y
Change Item: Left and Right Bumpers
Change Character: Left Trigger
